snippet: Thousands of off-duty police officers and public sector workers protested pay and budget cuts, and the government’s proposed changes to pension plans.
abstract: Thousands of off-duty police officers and public sector workers march through London to protest pay and budget cuts and the British government’s proposed changes to pension plans.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of off-duty police officers and public sector workers protested pay and budget cuts, and the government’s proposed changes to pension plans.

headline.main: Britain: Thousands Join Strike to Oppose Austerity Measures
headline.print_headline: Britain: Thousands Join Strike To Oppose Austerity Measures
